profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:09

did.abstract: Collection consists of mounted black and white and color reproductions of sculpture. Content varies from original photographic prints to reproductions from magazines and other published sources. Some sections have accompanying clippings folders.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code), or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sculpture Medium Format Photograph Collection, Arts Library, Yale University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: These materials are stored offsite at the Library Shelving Facility. For access to the materials, please make a request at the Art & Architecture Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized alphabetically by country. Further subdivided by individual artist name.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of mounted black and white and color reproductions of sculpture. Content varies from original photographic prints to reproductions from magazines and other published sources. Some sections have accompanying clippings folders.

did.unittitle: Archaic Period and date not known.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Some of these are marked as fake.

did.unittitle: Dalle Massegne, P. and J., active 1383-1409.
Mino da Fiesole, Manner of, XV C.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Also known as Daniele da Volterra.

did.unittitle: Zandomeneghi, Luigi and Pietro, XIX C.
Robbia, Luca della, 1399-1482, and Andrea della, 1435-1525.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes a folder of miscellaneous clippings.
